name: STRAND·ED
description:
Ed is stranded on an alien planet with no fuel.

Luckily, there are lots of radioactive rocks around. All he needs to do is gather them up and bring them back to his spaceship...

Unluckily, you're tasked with keeping his DNA intact. Good luck!

Controls

Unlit DNA will cause an error if it is allowed to duplicate! Click a segment to flip it, or click and drag a segment to swap it with its neighbors.

Rating

If you're eligible to vote in Ludum Dare 46, please consider rating my game

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/stranded-1

Credits

Thanks to every one who released free to use assets
